name: Ginseng
Relationship: Compare: ARAL.; COCA. HEDERA - Ivy - mental depression and skin irritation antidoted by Gunpowder.

Head: Vertigo, with gray spots before eyes; semi-lateral headache; occipital; difficult opening of eyelids; objects appear double
Throat: Tonsillitis, just like bellad, but in dark-complexioned people
Extremities: Bruised pain in small of back and thighs; nightly digging in right lower limb to toes
Stiff, contracted joints, heaviness of lower limbs
Burning heat in tips of fingers
Male: Voluptuous tickling at end of urethra

details: Said to be a stimulant to the secretory glands, especially salivary. Acts on the lower part of the spinal cord. LUMBAGO, SCIATICA, AND RHEUMATISM. Paralytic weakness. HICCOUGH. Skin symptoms, itching pimples on neck and chest.
